findings.message:
Reentrancy in SushiMaker._convert(address,address) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#386-400):
	External calls:
	- IERC20(address(pair)).safeTransfer(address(pair),pair.balanceOf(address(this))) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#393)
	- (amount0,amount1) = pair.burn(address(this)) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#395)
	- LogConvert(msg.sender,token0,token1,amount0,amount1,_convertStep(token0,token1,amount0,amount1)) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#399)
		- (success,data) = address(token).call(abi.encodeWithSelector(0xa9059cbb,to,amount)) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#198)
		- IERC20(sushi).safeTransfer(bar,amount) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#410)
		- IERC20(fromToken).safeTransfer(address(pair),amountIn) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#466)
		- pair.swap(0,amountOut,to,new bytes(0)) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#467)
		- IERC20(fromToken).safeTransfer(address(pair),amountIn) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#471)
		- pair.swap(amountOut,0,to,new bytes(0)) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#472)
		- IERC20(sushi).safeTransfer(bar,amount0) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#420)
		- IERC20(sushi).safeTransfer(bar,amount1) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#423)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- LogConvert(msg.sender,token0,token1,amount0,amount1,_convertStep(token0,token1,amount0,amount1)) (../..0xe11fc0b43ab98eb91e9836129d1ee7c3bc95df50.sol#399)
findings.name: reentrancy-events
